desc: I'm an Ohio local blacksmith/bladesmith with 8 years of experience. I specialize in creating a wide variety of hand-forged blades as well as an array of hand-forged goods. I keep a regular stock of "Makers Choice Blades" as well as offering custom designed blades.

layout.text: Hand-Forged Blades made in the USA to the highest standards of esthetic and functionality.
